We will be there as well - my 2 boys (3 and 6), me and a reluctant husband. I really look forward to meeting everybody!
Mara

Ren

messages.subject: Re: conferences
messages.msgSnippet: We ll see you at the NE Conference. We ll probably be extra excited because we ll be only a few weeks away from getting another retired guide dog for our
messages.messageBody:
We'll see you at the NE Conference. We'll probably be extra excited
because we'll be only a few weeks away from getting another retired
guide dog for our family - we're becoming an 'active senior housing'
home (serially though, more than two dogs at once is too much for our
space and sanity).

Deb

messages.msgSnippet: ... Ha!  That is just what I was explaining to John today.  That we ARE going, even if it all has to go on the credit card!  I reasoned that someday we ll
messages.messageBody:

> It's worth going into debt for...honest. It's changed my life and
> brought some truly incredible people into our world. I'm so grateful

Ha! That is just what I was explaining to John today. That we ARE going,
even if it all has to go on the credit card! I reasoned that 'someday we'll
both be working, we can worry about paying off the card then!"
Irresponsible? Probably! But I'm not missing this opportunity to
re-connect with my tribe!

Can't wait until September!
Karen

messages.subject: conferences
messages.msgSnippet: Robin and Ron, who left all their fears in the hotel wastebasket. I LOVE this!!:) This is one of the best parts about the conferences to me....hearing about
messages.messageBody:
"Robin and Ron, who left all their fears in the hotel wastebasket."

I LOVE this!!:)
This is one of the best parts about the conferences to me....hearing
about Dads (or moms or kids) that gain a deep and abiding confidence
in unschooling afterwards. Very cool.

If anyone would like to meet a very large group of unschoolers, hear
speakers and enjoy an AMAZING weekend, go to
liveandlearnconference.org for more information on Albuquerque.

It's worth going into debt for...honest. It's changed my life and
brought some truly incredible people into our world. I'm so grateful
for Ben and Kelly's energy going into this truly unique event.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
